Title: Bundled libwebp in pywebp vulnerable
Description:
### Impact
pywebp versions before v0.3.0 bundled libwebp binaries in wheels that is vulnerable to CVE-2023-4863. The vulnerability was a heap buffer overflow which allowed a remote attacker to perform an out-of-bounds memory write.

### Patches
The problem has been patched upstream in libwebp 1.3.2.
pywebp was updated to bundle a patched version of libwebp in v0.3.0.

### Workarounds
No known workarounds without upgrading.
